title: 48 - Why People Are Leaving The Church Part 2
description:
In this episode @IzziRay joins us again to discuss the topic of leaving the church.  A couple years ago, John Pavlovitz, a pastor located in North Carolina, posted a blog called,  “Church, Here’s Why People Are Leaving You. Part 1″. Today we explore the last two points to the 5 point commentary, 4. (Church) You choose lousy battles. and 5. Your love doesn’t look like love.  Looking forward to your comments and thoughts. Enjoy!

Read the original blog post here: www.johnpavlovitz.com/2014/08/15/churc…ving-you-part-1/

Learn more about Izzi Ray:
www.izziray.com

- Mike Erre

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com

Mike Erre participates as VOX Team Leader at VOX Community, a church expression of the VOX Podcast.  Learn more about VOX Community at www.voxoc.com.

Listen to our Sunday teaching from VOX Community:
www.soundcloud.com/voxcommunity
